body_html:
@soumith - my CPU memory utilization is currently 12 out of 32GB. I don't believe that the issue is disk errors, since it happens when I load all of my dataset into memory (it's not really large, e.g, CIFAR-10/100).
@apaszke - As far as GPU utilization, I'm not sure what you mean by GPU computing-power, I have indicators of memory usage, temperature, volatile gpu-util

| 56% 85C P2 232W / 250W | 3787MiB / 12186MiB | 88% Default |
